name: Axis Football
description: Axis Football is a 3D American Football game that features excellent controls and a unique touch passing system that gives unprecedented accuracy and control of where the ball is thrown. Game modes include: Single match, Franchise mode, Coach mode, and AI vs AI. All 32 cities from the NFL are represented in Axis Football, and each team features its own ranking in passing, running, pass defense, run defense, and special teams.
